name: Outside - Stray Cat
description:
You wake up next to your usual garbage tray, where you scavenge for food whenever the Cat Catchers are not around. Being a stray cat is hard and it has no fun in it. That is until you meet Eva, the white cat, who catches your attention. She must be living a great life, and you know you want that life for yourself as well. It's time for you to leave behind the street and set out for the unknown.

Follow Eva through the city to her home, while avoiding the lights.

Developed by - The Curviest Pidgeon

Programmers:
Thomas Sheppard - https://tomshep65.wixsite.com/mysite/
